products_services.name: Donkey Support Widget
products_services.description: A customer support chat widget that embeds into a user's application. It allows replying to customers from Slack, Discord, or Telegram, and automatically follows up with email if replies are unseen.
core_benefits: Fast replies from preferred platforms (Slack, Discord, Telegram)
Simple design – no complex ticket systems
products_services.target_audience: Solo builders, solopreneurs, and small teams.

unique_value_props: Reply from Slack, Discord, or Telegram
Built for solo builders – simple and affordable
differentiators: Focus on simplicity and ease of use
Integration with popular messaging platforms (Slack, Discord, Telegram)
Automated email follow-ups to ensure no customer is left unanswered
primary_pains: Complexity of traditional customer support systems
Difficulty managing support requests across multiple platforms
desired_outcomes: Centralized inbox for all support requests
objections: Hesitation to switch from existing support systems
Questioning the reliability of automated follow-ups
allowed_claims: Free to use (with a free tier)
